name: Chinese Culture Club
officers:
Irene Chou, ichou794, President, lead the club and manage all club activities, such as meetings, fundraisers,
special events, etc.
Kevin Jia, kjia158, Vice President, lead the club with the president, assist the president and other officers in any
needs as well as helping out with financial and outreach subjects.
Minseo Park, mpark718, Treasurer, manages all financial needs of the club and assist in holding meetings.
Ethan Shen, eshen006, Secretary, manage meeting minutes and assist in holding meetings
Aileen Wang, awang295, Public Relations, create promotional graphics for meetings/events, contact other
organizations for any needs, and assist in holding meetings.
adjustment_policy: If any of the officers become unable to commit to the club, the Vice President will take over their roles until we can find a suitable replacement.
new_officer_application: All applicants would sign up through a google form with multiple questions to help us gauge if they're suited for a certain role or not. Additionally, there will be an interview process for those who are deemed excellent from the google forms. The best candidates will be chosen for each role after that.
